title: 1980년 McCrae 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: McCrae. 판결일: 1980-05-13. 법원: District Court of Appeal of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Robert Lee McCRAE v. METROPOLITAN DADE COUNTY
**판결일**: 1980-05-13
**법원**: District Court of Appeal of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Hubbart, Nesbitt, Pearson

## 변호인

Kaplan, Sicking, Hessen, Sugarman, Ro-senthal & DeCastro and Robert A. Sugar-man, Miami, for appellant., Robert A. Ginsburg, County Atty. and Amy N. Dean, Asst. County Atty., for ap-pellee.

## 인용

- 383 So. 2d 319

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
The order of the circuit court dismissing the appeal is reversed and the appeal reinstated on the reasoning and authority of Murray v. Metropolitan Dade County, 382 So.2d 884 (Fla. 3d DCA 1980).
Reversed and remanded.
...
